extensionDescription.message: Adds a column to the Thunderbird message list to display the message preview in a tooltip on column row icon mouse hover or a short preview in the column row itself.

previewNoAccess.message: You are not logged in or have disallowed IMAP downloads

previewNoMimeMsg.message: The message could not be retrieved - mimeMsg is null

previewSeparator.description: Preview tooptip string; separator length matches title length in proportional font.

previewTooltipEnabled.message: Enable Preview tooltip on column row mouse hover

previewTooltipMaxSize.message: Maximum characters to display in tooltip:

previewTextEnabled.message: Enable Preview text display in column row (adjust width to view)

previewTextMaxSize.message: Maximum characters to display in column row:

previewGetAuto.message: Automatically, when row is scrolled into view

imapAllowDownload.message: Download imap message, if necessary, to get the preview
